title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - August 21, 2021
itunes:title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - August 21, 2021
description: Adam and Mark grab Dr. Drew and duck out of the Carolla Family BBQ to give an update on where Mark is with the LA Times and they review some 8 year old audio related to 'an eel with a learning disorder'.
